::Savanna::

She growled fearsly as HellBeast hits her down.  She shook her head 
to regain herself as Transanulas shot webbing over her.  She tried to 
transform into bot mode, but the webbing held her down.
"HELLBEAST! I"LL GET YOU FOR THIS!"  She struggled under the web 
trying to break free, using her claws and teeth.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
> 
> ::: Hell Beast, hurt from Savana, turns and slaps her to the 
ground. 
> Transanulas, missing all of his legs and red in a tempter, shoots a 
web net 
> over her. :::
> 
> ::: Hell Beast ::: Excellent! The Ark is done for. Come, we will 
return to 
> the base.
> 
> ::: Jackle, Gremlin, Transanulas, Hell Beast, and hopefully 
Inferno, Rampage, 
> Tankkor, and Scourge return to base. :::
